metadata.synopsis: The player says this if they open Lorgan's chest and then succeed on a passive investigation check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Open Wooden Chest - S_WYR_OpenHand_LorgansChest - fa41b720-f976-41ab-81bb-5d2b70b9136e - (-91 41 -5)Succeed on the passive check

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This chest is deeper than it looks... A double bottom. Of course.
